Livecoding

The nature of livecoding is that it is performed (improvised) in-the-moment; the gig (performance) is the output (that's why it's called livecoding), and any artefact (e.g. a video recording) is useful documentation, but only a trace of the work itself.

Still, documentation is an important part of one's artistic practice, so here's a bunch of photos and videos from my gigs. Some of them are nice & slick-looking, some of them are super-grungy videos shot on smartphones in the crowd. Although I'm working hard to track down any old videos, some of these gigs are lost to time. I like to assume that they were the best ones ;)

  • SMCClab live #1 7 Nov 2025 - PK Big Band Room, ANU School of Music
  • Coloring Code - Live Drawing and Coding 31 May 2024 - Shanghai Concert Hall, China
  • OzCHI '22 Connected Creativity Algorave 1 Dec 2022 - Ainslie Arts Centre
  • ACMC'22 Evening Concert #1 31 Aug 2022 - Ahumairangi, Block 1, Massey University, Wellington NZ
  • ACMC'21 Evening Concert #1 26 Aug 2021 - Australian Institute of Music
  • ICLC'20 Algorave 7 Feb 2020 - https://www.flannerysbar.ie
  • smoke 30 Jan 2020 - PK Big Band Room, ANU School of Music
  • Colour Coded 2 Aug 2019 - Drill Hall Gallery, Canberra
  • CECS Welcome Party 2019 26 Feb 2019 - ANU College of Engineering, Computing and Cybernetics
  • Shirty Science Season 3 launch party 13 Aug 2018 - Doughnut Dept., Canberra
  • National Science Week '18 ACT Launch Event 10 Aug 2018 - Molo Bar, Australian National University
  • Soundscapes Concert Series #21 3 May 2018 - Smiths Alternative Bookshop, Canberra
  • National Invention Convention '18 Closing Ceremony 19 Jan 2018 - Questacon, Canberra
  • National Science Week '17 ACT Launch Event 11 Aug 2017 - National Film and Sound Archive, Canberra
  • Collected Resonances: Session 2 26 Aug 2015 - ANU School of Music, Canberra
  • Innovation ACT 2015 Launch 12 Aug 2015 - John Curtin School of Medical Research, Canberra
  • The AP Sessions 30 Sept 2014 - Australian National University
  • ACMC '14: Australasian Computer Music Conference 10 July 2014 - Victorian College of the Arts, Melbourne
  • John Hosking Farewell Reception 28 May 2014 - Drill Hall Gallery, Canberra

  • Revenant Media: Theremin '75 Exhibition 25 Oct 2013 - ANU School of Art Gallery, Canberra
